coverage_rules.description: Tire change service is included in all policies. We'll replace your flat tire with your spare.
coverage_rules.conditions: Vehicle must have a functional spare tire. Does not include tire replacement cost.

coverage_rules.description: Battery jump start is included in all policies. We'll provide a jump start to get you moving.
coverage_rules.conditions: If battery needs replacement, customer is responsible for battery cost.

coverage_rules.description: Emergency fuel delivery (up to 2 gallons) to get you to nearest gas station.
coverage_rules.conditions: Customer pays for fuel cost. Delivery service is free.

coverage_rules.description: Professional locksmith service to help you access your vehicle.
coverage_rules.conditions: Does not cover key replacement costs.

coverage_rules.description: Towing to nearest qualified repair facility.
coverage_rules.conditions: Basic policy holders: Not covered. Premium: Up to 100 miles. Platinum: Up to 200 miles.
coverage_rules.not_covered_reason: Engine repairs and towing require Premium or Platinum coverage.

coverage_rules.description: Towing to nearest transmission specialist or preferred repair shop.
coverage_rules.conditions: Repair costs not included. Rental car available for Premium/Platinum members.
coverage_rules.not_covered_reason: Transmission issues require Premium or Platinum coverage for towing.

coverage_rules.description: Emergency towing from accident scene to repair facility or impound.
coverage_rules.conditions: Coordinate with police report. May require separate collision coverage claim.
coverage_rules.not_covered_reason: Accident towing requires Premium or Platinum coverage.

coverage_rules.description: Winching service to extract vehicle from mud, snow, or ditch (within 100 feet of paved road).
coverage_rules.conditions: Vehicle must be accessible by service truck. Off-road recovery not covered.
coverage_rules.not_covered_reason: Winching services require Premium or Platinum coverage.

luxury_vehicles.note: Luxury vehicle owners typically have Premium or Platinum coverage

economy_vehicles.note: Economy vehicle owners typically have Basic coverage

premium.rental_car: Up to $50/day for 3 days while vehicle is being repaired

platinum.rental_car: Up to $75/day for 5 days while vehicle is being repaired
platinum.trip_interruption: Up to $500 for hotel, meals, and alternate transportation if breakdown occurs 100+ miles from home

policy_notes: All coverage is subject to annual service limits (Basic: 3 calls, Premium: 6 calls, Platinum: Unlimited)
Services must be arranged through our dispatch center to be covered
Member is responsible for repair costs, parts, and any non-covered services
Coverage area: Continental United States and Canada
